settings.title: Terms of Service
settings.description:
Naturely Pure Terms of Service

1. Introduction
Welcome to NaturelyPure! These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. Please read them carefully.

2. User Agreement
By accessing and using our website or services, you agree to abide by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or services.

3. Privacy
Your use of our website and services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which can be found here.. Please review this policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.

4. Use of Services
a. You may use our website and services for lawful purposes only.
b. You must be of legal age to use our services in your jurisdiction or have parental/guardian consent.
c. You agree not to engage in any activity that violates these Terms of Service or applicable laws.

5. Orders and Payments
a. When you place an order, you agree to pay the specified price, including any applicable taxes and shipping fees.
b. We reserve the right to cancel or refuse orders at our discretion.
c. Payment information is processed securely. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details.

6. Shipping
a. Shipping information, including estimated delivery times, can be found on our Shipping page.
b. We are not responsible for delays or issues caused by third-party shipping carriers.

7. Returns and Refunds
a. Information about returns and refunds can be found on our Returns and Refunds page.

8. Intellectual Property
a. All content on our website is protected by intellectual property laws and is the property of NaturelyPure or its licensors.

9. Termination
a. We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at our discretion.

10. Contact Information
For questions or concerns regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@naturelypure.com.
